title: MiniGolf Maker
description:
Create your course using the Course Creator, one of the most ambitious level editors to ever be created for a miniature golf game. Full control of the shape and size of each piece your greens. No more being bound by a limited number of pre-made pieces. Tiny Combat Arena
8 Environments: Desert, Halloween, Medieval, Winter, Pirate, Dreamscape, Polyworld, and Arcade. Behaviors and Events system for creating dynamic courses. Detailed control of the style of your course. Use power-ups to give yourself an edge or get in the way of your friends:
